edge: Aditya and KD used to be in a band together. After Aditya moved on, Sakshi showed old photos and videos of the band to KD and asked him to come to Aditya's birthday party. However, Aditya was surprised and angry when KD attended without Joe.
Sakshi planned a birthday party for Aditya and asked KD to come with an invitation to the rest of the band. After Aditya found out, he scolded Sakshi for trying to dig up his past.
Joe is married to Debbie, but she supports the family financially through her fishing business. Debbie holds a grudge against the band for affecting Joe's life.
KD and Rob invited Joe to Aditya's birthday party after finding him through old photos. Later, KD and Rob attended the party without Joe.
Aditya was shocked to see Joe's friends at his birthday party after learning that Sakshi had invited them. Aditya later scolded Sakshi for digging up his past.
After hearing about the band's reunion, Debbie arranged a guitar-playing job for Joe on a cruise ship. This created tension between Joe and Sakshi.
After learning about the band's reunion, Debbie arranged a guitar-playing job for Joe on a cruise ship. Later, Aditya reconciled with Joe and the rest of the band.
KD and Rob visited their old practice place to reminisce about their band days. Aditya later joined them.
After learning about the band's reunion, Devika convinced Aditya to face his past and meet with his former bandmates.
The band, Magik, is the central focus of the film Rock On!!.
The band, Magik, participates in a contest in the film Rock On!!.
In the film Rock On!!, Debbie arranges a guitar-playing job for Joe on a cruise ship.
In the film Rock On!!, Aditya runs into Tanya, who is married to Magik's former rival.
In the film Rock On!!, Aditya apologizes to Tanya for his actions.
In the film Rock On!!, Rob is a member of Magik and dies from a brain tumor.
The baby boy of Sakshi and Devika in the film Rock On!! is named after Rob.
In the film Rock On!!, Devika starts dating KD, who goes on to start a record company with Joe.
In the film Rock On!!, Debbie quits her job in the fishing business.
After quitting her job in the fishing business, Debbie becomes a successful stylist in the film Rock On!!.

Rock On is a directorial venture by Abhishek Kapoor.
Rock On deals with a challenging subject.
The director pulls off the challenging subject with élan.
The actors deliver superlative performances in Rock On.
Kaveree Bamzai calls Rock On 'refreshing' and 'surprisingly quiet and thoughtful.'
Rajee Masand gives Rock On three out of five stars.
The original score and songs in Rock On are composed by Shankar–Ehsaan–Loy.
The lyrics of the songs in Rock On are written by Javed Akhtar.
According to Box Office India, the soundtrack album of Rock On has sold around 12,00,000 units.
A sequel to Rock On, titled Rock On 2, was released in 2016.
